scripts.buildpi: electron-packager emby-theater-electron emby-theater --platform linux --arch armv7l --out dist/ && electron-installer-debian --config ./extras/optionspi.json
scripts.build64: electron-packager emby-theater-electron emby-theater --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ && electron-installer-debian --config ./extras/optionsamd64.json
